```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
sb_r3 <- list(
  v1 = c(1, 0, 0),
  v2 = c(0, 1, 0),
  v3 = c(0, 0, 1)
)
```

```{r}
lop <- function(f) {
  structure(f, class = c("lop", class(f)))
}
```

```{r}
as.matrix.lop <- function(f, basis) {
  n <- length(basis)
  vs <- map(basis, f)
  lift_vl(matrix)(vs, n)
}
```

```{r}
f <- function(u) {
  stopifnot(length(u) == 3)
  x <- u[1]
  y <- u[2]
  z <- u[3]
  c(x + y, 2*x + 3*y, z - 3*y)
}
f <- lop(f)

F <- as.matrix(f, sb_r3)
F
```

```{r}
w <- c(3, 2, -4)
f(w)
F %*% w
```

```{r}
g <- function(u) {
  stopifnot(length(u) == 3)
  x <- u[1]
  y <- u[2]
  z <- u[3]
  c(x - y, -2*x + 6*y, -2*z + 5*y)
}
g <- lop(g)

G <- as.matrix(g, sb_r3)
G
```

```{r}
F %*% G %*% w

f(g(w))
```

```{r}
`+.lop` <- function(f, g) {
  function(...) {
    f(...) + g(...)
  }
}
```

```{r}
(f + g)(w)
f(w) + g(w)
F + G
(F + G) %*% w
```

```{r}
as.lop <- function(M) {
  f <- function(u) {
    M %*% u
  }
  lop(f)
}
```

```{r}
as.lop(F)(w)
```

```{r}
sb_r2 <- list(
  c(1, 0), 
  c(0, 1)
  )
```

```{r}
rot_90 <- function(u) {
  stopifnot(length(u) == 2)
  x <- u[1]
  y <- u[2]
  th <- pi/2
  c(x*cos(th) - y*sin(th), 
    x*sin(th) + y*cos(th))
}
rot_90 <- lop(rot_90)
```

```{r}
as.matrix(rot_90, sb_r2)
```

```{r}
rot <- function(theta) {
  f <- function(u) {
    stopifnot(length(u) == 2)
    x <- u[1]
    y <- u[2]
    c(x*cos(theta) - y*sin(theta), 
      x*sin(theta) + y*cos(theta))
  }
  lop(f)
}

rot_180 <- rot(pi)
```

```{r}
arr <- function(xend, yend, x = 0, y = 0, ...) {
  annotate("segment", x = x, xend = xend, y = y, yend = yend, 
           arrow = arrow(length = unit(2, "mm"), type = "closed"),
           ...)
}
arr_ <- lift(arr)
```


```{r}
p <- ggplot() +
  coord_equal(xlim = c(-2, 2), ylim = c(-2, 2))

w <- c(1.5, 2)

p + 
  arr_(w, color = "red") +
  arr_(rot(pi/2)(w), color = "orange") +
  arr_(rot(pi)(w), color = "blue")
```

```{r}
df <- data_frame(
  th = seq(0, 2*pi, length.out = 100),
  l = map(th, ~rot(.)(c(1, 0))),
  x = map_dbl(l, 1),
  y = map_dbl(l, 2)
)
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(xend = x, yend = y, color = as.factor(runif(100)))) +
  geom_segment(x = 0, y = 0,
               arrow = arrow(length = unit(2, "mm"), type = "closed"),
               show.legend = FALSE) +
  coord_equal()
```
